services.name: Auth Gateway
services.description: OAuth broker + session minting across tenants

services.name: Workflow Engine
services.description: Background job runner with saga support

timeline.title: Workflow engine outage
timeline.body: Investigating elevated error rates after a dependency upgrade. Requests in APAC are failing with HTTP 503.

timeline.title: Realtime stream degradation
timeline.body: Connections in us-east-1 are reconnecting more frequently. No data loss; expect intermittent interruptions.

timeline.title: Planned database maintenance
timeline.body: Read replicas in eu-west-2 will undergo patching. Failover testing will cause brief read-only windows.
